snippet.title: Exipelago Trailer
snippet.description:
Exipelago is a Colony Builder PC Game for Windows, where you manage your settlers to build giant Settlements in a fully destructible 3D World with z-levels, Water & Light Simulation, Mood Caring, Farming, Mining, Crafting and Building. Heavily inspired from Games like Gnomoria, Rimworld and Dwarf Fortress

Currently in Early Access

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1948540/Exipelago/
Forum: https://exipelago.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/QUYPekWA2q
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/exipelago/

#exipelago #basebuilding
